text: For households whose primary cooking fuel is wood (or crop residues),
would you be willing to pay ${CF} for this improved cookstove,
if you were given 12 months to make the payment?
This chart includes responses from 17.88% of households in the Nigeria MTF survey sample (total size = 3,668).
Use the dropdown filters to interact with the data.
